title: Fuchu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar URC; upper center
description: three women are being carried across the river at LR, one is on a man\'s back, another in a palanquin, and another on a flat carrier; another group of men leads a horse with three large boxes across the river; another group of men wades in the back; flat plain in middle ground, mountains in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
